title: Sinegal Estate Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, February 4, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for an elegant tasting featuring the acclaimed wines of Sinegal Estate, a family-owned Napa Valley producer known for crafting polished, site-driven Cabernet Sauvignon and refined Pinot Noir.

Tasting Fee: $45 (Buy a bottle from the tasting and your fee is refunded)

Featured Wines:

• Sinegal Estate Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 – 94 pts James Suckling – Plush and layered with currant, graphite, smoked herbs, floral lift, and chocolaty oak wrapped around a beautifully structured core.

• Sinegal Estate Sonoma Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 – Rich and expressive with baked blueberry, blackberry, sweet leather, baking spice, dark chocolate, and supple tannins supported by bright acidity.

• Sinegal Details Sonoma County Cabernet Sauvignon 2021 – 92 pts Jeb Dunnuck – Velvety and forward with cassis, jammy currants, violets, and polished oak in a beautifully balanced, ready-to-enjoy style.

• Sinegal Pinot Noir (Sonoma) – Bright and elegant with cherry, cranberry, wild strawberry, black tea, forest floor, and a lively, mineral-driven finish.

Experience the precision, depth, and craftsmanship of Sinegal Estate—buy a bottle and your tasting is free.
